CmdLine: if [ $(command -v apt-get) ]; then apt-get -y -o Acquire::GzipIndexes=false update && apt-get upgrade -y && apt-get install -y python python3 sudo apt-utils bash ca-certificates gnupg gcc systemd systemd-sysv dbus rsyslog && apt-get clean;     elif [ $(command -v dnf) ]; then dnf upgrade -y && dnf --assumeyes install python2 python36 sudo dnf-utils bash gnupg gcc systemd systemd-sysv dbus rsyslog && dnf clean all;     elif [ $(command -v yum) ]; then yum upgrade -y && yum install -y python python3 sudo yum-utils bash gnupg gcc systemd systemd-sysv dbus rsyslog systemd-networkd && sed -i 's/plugins=0/plugins=1/g' /etc/yum.conf && yum clean all;     fi
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: cd /lib/systemd/system/sysinit.target.wants/; for i in *; do [ systemd-tmpfiles-setup.service = "$i"  ] || rm -f $i; done;
Commands.Name: run
